meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>continuation</kanji> of <kanji>study</kanji>ing is the time that passes that we study. This is <vocabulary>academic history</vocabulary>, so pay close attention!
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
